scripts.initdb: docker run -d --name postgres-dev -e POSTGRES_DB=${npm_package_name}_dev -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=password -v $(pwd)/psql-data:/var/lib/postgresql/data -p 5432:5432 postgres
scripts.killdb: docker stop postgres-dev; docker rm -v postgres-dev; rm -rf psql-data
scripts.psql: docker exec -it postgres-dev psql -h localhost -U postgres
scripts.setupvenv: python3 -m virtualenv pyenv; echo 'export DJANGO_SECRET_KEY=notverysecret DB_HOST=localhost DB_PASS=password DB_USER=postgres DB_NAME=${npm_package_name}_dev EMAIL_HOST= EMAIL_USER= EMAIL_PASS=' >> pyenv/bin/activate; . ./pyenv/bin/activate; pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.getlatestdata: archive=$(ls -t1 ../../frekky-aws-deploy/backups/peddleweb_data* | head -n1); name=$(basename $archive | sed 's/\.tar\.xz//g'); tar xvf $archive; docker exec -i postgres-dev psql -h localhost -U postgres peddleweb_dev < $name/postgres_peddleweb.sql; echo $name;
